about.storyShort: After wrestling 2.3 million spreadsheet cells on GCC mega-projects we built Feasly to kill the spreadsheet.
about.storyLong: We spent a decade cleaning spreadsheets for PIF and NEOM projects. Feasly is our answer: live, compliant, and Arabic-friendly modelling in minutes.
